title: Chapter details information

xdm:friendlyName.title: Chapter Name
xdm:friendlyName.description: The name of the chapter and/or segment.

xdm:length.title: Chapter Length Or Duration
xdm:length.description: The length of the chapter, in seconds.

xdm:offset.title: Chapter Offset
xdm:offset.description: The offset of the chapter inside the content (in seconds) from the start.

xdm:index.title: Chapter Position
xdm:index.description: The position (index, integer) of the chapter inside the content.

xdm:ID.title: Chapter ID
xdm:ID.description: The auto-generated ID of the chapter.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Chapter Time Played
xdm:timePlayed.description: The time spent on the chapter, in seconds.
